name: Tetris 2012
description:
Yet one more Tetris. Just For Fun.

Controls F1 HelpW / UpRotate the figureA / LeftMove the figure leftD / RightMove the figure rightS / DownMove the figure downSpaceDrop the figureTTurn on/off soundHTurn on/off the figure helperF12Take a screenshot Scoring 1 line10 x level2 lines25 x level3 lines50 x level4 lines100 x level
